bug.author: lvybriage
bug.summary: API "/api/v1/nni/trial-jobs/xxx" doesn't show a trial's all parameters in multiphase experiment
bug.description:
: When I click the link, <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60659229-7b6c9d00-9e87-11e9-88b5-7916501cf356.png></denchmark-link>
I find that trial's parameters only have one rather than all parameters. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60659242-832c4180-9e87-11e9-8a02-66eb8d008774.png></denchmark-link>
In api/v1/nni/trial-jobs, I see all parameters in a trial. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60659288-993a0200-9e87-11e9-914e-73ffa9d96e10.png></denchmark-link>
Brief what process you are following: How to reproduce it: nni Environment:
nni version: nni mode(local|pai|remote): OS: python version: is conda or virtualenv used?: is running in docker?:
need to update document(yes/no): Anything else we need to know:

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/chicm-ms>@chicm-ms</denchmark-link> Could you help deal with this problem?
